ComicInfo.Title: Full Throttle Dark, Part Four
ComicInfo.Summary:
"FULL THROTTLE DARK," Part Four
The road runs out as Val reaches the fabled location of her promised sanctuary. Will she find the haven she so desperately seeks, or will something far more terrifying be waiting for her?
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|---------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Tony Daniel & Tomeu Morey | 1-2 | | B | Cover B | Jenny Frison | 3 | | C | Cover C | Tony Daniel | 4 |
